title: Pitchfork's Top 50 Albums for 2008 (01-15)
description:
This is the first of 4 torrents - each torrent in 15 albums sets from Pitchfork's Top 50 Albums for 2008 - with an additional 10 albums (my favorites that were not included in Pitchfork's list) in the last set. This is 01 thru 15. The next will be 16-thru30 and so on.  Here is the top 15:

01. Fleet Foxes - Sun Giant EP/Fleet Foxes
02. Portishead - Third 
03. No Age - Nouns
04. Cut Copy - In Ghost Colours
05. Deerhunter - Microcastle
06. TV On The Radio - Dear Science
07. Vampire Weekend - Vampire Weekend 
08. M83 - Saturdays Youth
09. Hercules and Love Affair - Hercules and Love Affair 
10. DJ/rupture-Uproot
11. Lil Wayne - Tha Carter III 
12. Lindstrom - Where You Go I Go Too
13. Erykah Badu - New Amerykah Part One (4th World War) 
14. Air France - No Way Down
15. Crystal Castles - Crystal Castles

As the list clearly demonstrates - it has been another amazing year in music - apart from the usual mainstream commercial drivel that dominates the corporate airwaves. 

I want to thank everyone in the PB community for making this one of the best Torrent site anywhere. May you all have a prosperous, healthy and transformational 2009. Enjoy!
